statements: SELECT * FROM customer_consent_data;
SELECT customer_name FROM customer_consent_data;
SELECT customer_name, consent_given FROM customer_consent_data;
SELECT * FROM customer_consent_data WHERE consent_given = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM customer_consent_data WHERE customer_name = 'Alice';
SELECT customer_name, consent_date FROM customer_consent_data WHERE consent_given = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM customer_consent_data WHERE consent_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, consent_given FROM customer_consent_data WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM customer_consent_data ORDER BY consent_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customer_consent_data;
SELECT AVG(id) FROM customer_consent_data;
SELECT MIN(consent_date) FROM customer_consent_data;
SELECT MAX(id) FROM customer_consent_data;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM customer_consent_data;
SELECT SUM(id) FROM customer_consent_data;
SELECT * FROM customer_consent_data LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_consent_data OFFSET 10;
SELECT * FROM customer_consent_data WHERE consent_given = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM customer_consent_data WHERE consent_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM customer_consent_data WHERE customer_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob');
SELECT * FROM customer_consent_data WHERE consent_given = TRUE
SELECT customer_name, consent_date FROM customer_consent_data WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT id, customer_name, consent_date FROM customer_consent_data WHERE consent_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM customer_consent_data ORDER BY consent_date DESC
SELECT AVG(id) AS average_id FROM customer_consent_data WHERE consent_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_consents FROM customer_consent_data GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_consents > 1
SELECT customer_name, SUM(id) AS total_id_sum FROM customer_consent_data WHERE consent_given = TRUE GROUP BY customer_name
SELECT customer_name, consent_date, CASE WHEN consent_given = TRUE THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS consent_status FROM customer_consent_data
SELECT customer_name, consent_date, DATEDIFF(NOW(), consent_date) AS days_since_consent FROM customer_consent_data WHERE consent_given = TRUE
SELECT customer_name, MONTH(consent_date) AS consent_month FROM customer_consent_data WHERE YEAR(consent_date) = YEAR(NOW())
SELECT customer_name, consent_date, CONCAT('Consent was given on ', DATE_FORMAT(consent_date, '%Y-%m-%d')) AS consent_info FROM customer_consent_data
SELECT customer_name, consent_date, CONCAT('Customer: ', customer_name, ' gave consent on ', DATE_FORMAT(consent_date, '%M %d, %Y')) AS consent_details FROM customer_consent_data
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers_with_consents FROM customer_consent_data WHERE consent_given = TRUE
SELECT * FROM customer_consent_data WHERE customer_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie')
SELECT customer_name, consent_date FROM customer_consent_data WHERE consent_date = (SELECT MAX(consent_date) FROM customer_consent_data)
SELECT customer_name, consent_date FROM customer_consent_data WHERE DATE(consent_date) = CURDATE()
SELECT customer_name, consent_date FROM customer_consent_data WHERE WEEKDAY(consent_date) = 0
SELECT customer_name, consent_date FROM customer_consent_data WHERE WEEKDAY(consent_date) IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT customer_name, consent_date, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, consent_date, NOW()) AS months_since_consent FROM customer_consent_data
SELECT MAX(id) AS max_id FROM customer_consent_data
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE consent_given = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM consent_logs;
SELECT customer_id, consent_date FROM consent_logs WHERE customer_id = 456;
SELECT customer_id, consent_type FROM consent_logs WHERE consent_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers LEFT JOIN consent_logs ON customers.customer_id = consent_logs.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, consent_date FROM customers INNER JOIN consent_logs ON customers.customer_id = consent_logs.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, consent_type FROM customers RIGHT JOIN consent_logs ON customers.customer_id = consent_logs.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, consent_date FROM customers LEFT JOIN consent_logs ON customers.customer_id = consent_logs.customer_id WHERE consent_given = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, consent_type FROM customers RIGHT JOIN consent_logs ON customers.customer_id = consent_logs.customer_id WHERE consent_date <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, consent_given FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (100, 200, 300);
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, consent_given FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers FROM customers;
SELECT MAX(consent_date) AS latest_consent_date FROM consent_logs;
SELECT AVG(customer_id) AS avg_customer_id FROM customers;
SELECT DISTINCT consent_type FROM consent_logs;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(log_id) AS consent_logs_count FROM consent_logs GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(DATEDIFF(NOW(), consent_date)) AS avg_days_since_consent FROM consent_logs GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE consent_given = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM consent_logs);
SELECT customers.customer_name, consent_logs.consent_date FROM customers JOIN consent_logs ON customers.customer_id = consent_logs.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, consent_date FROM customers LEFT JOIN consent_logs ON customers.customer_id = consent_logs.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(log_id) AS consent_count FROM customers JOIN consent_logs ON customers.customer_id = consent_logs.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, MAX(consent_date) AS latest_consent_date FROM customers JOIN consent_logs ON customers.customer_id = consent_logs.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM consent_logs WHERE consent_date = '2022-01-01');
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM consent_logs WHERE customers.customer_id = consent_logs.customer_id);
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(log_id) AS consent_count FROM customers LEFT JOIN consent_logs ON customers.customer_id = consent_logs.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id HAVING consent_count <= 3;

SELECT customer_name, AVG(SELECT CAST(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM age(consent_date)) AS INTEGER)) AS avg_age FROM customers JOIN consent_logs ON customers.customer_id = consent_logs.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, consent_type FROM customers JOIN consent_logs ON customers.customer_id = consent_logs.customer_id WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM consent_date) = 1;
SELECT customer_name, consent_type FROM customers JOIN consent_logs ON customers.customer_id = consent_logs.customer_id WHERE consent_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(log_id) AS consent_count FROM customers JOIN consent_logs ON customers.customer_id = consent_logs.customer_id WHERE consent_type = 'email' GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, consent_type, consent_date FROM customers JOIN consent_logs ON customers.customer_id = consent_logs.customer_id ORDER BY consent_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, CASE WHEN consent_given THEN 'Given' ELSE 'Not Given' END AS consent_status FROM customers;

SELECT customer_name, AVG(SELECT CAST(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE) AS INTEGER) - CAST(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM age(consent_date)) AS INTEGER)) AS avg_reg_days FROM customers JOIN consent_logs ON customers.customer_id = consent_logs.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id;

SELECT customer_name, consent_type, COUNT(customer_id) AS consent_count FROM customers JOIN consent_logs ON customers.customer_id = consent_logs.customer_id GROUP BY consent_type HAVING consent_count >= 2;
SELECT customer_name, consent_type, consent_date FROM customers JOIN consent_logs ON customers.customer_id = consent_logs.customer_id WHERE DATE_PART('year', AGE(consent_date)) > 1;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE consent_given = true;
SELECT * FROM consent_logs;
SELECT log_id, consent_date FROM consent_logs;
SELECT customer_id, consent_action FROM consent_logs;
SELECT * FROM consent_preferences;
SELECT preference_id, customer_id, preference_type FROM consent_preferences;
SELECT customer_id, preference_type, preference_value FROM consent_preferences;
SELECT c.customer_name, cl.consent_date FROM customers c JOIN consent_logs cl ON c.customer_id = cl.customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, cp.preference_type, cp.preference_value FROM customers c JOIN consent_preferences cp ON c.customer_id = cp.customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, cl.consent_date, cp.preference_type FROM customers c JOIN consent_logs cl ON c.customer_id = cl.customer_id JOIN consent_preferences cp ON c.customer_id = cp.customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, cl.consent_action, cp.preference_type FROM customers c JOIN consent_logs cl ON c.customer_id = cl.customer_id JOIN consent_preferences cp ON c.customer_id = cp.customer_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customers;
SELECT AVG(customer_id) FROM customers;
SELECT MAX(customer_id) FROM customers;
SELECT MIN(customer_id) FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(log_id) FROM customers c JOIN consent_logs cl ON c.customer_id = cl.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, MAX(consent_date) FROM customers c JOIN consent_logs cl ON c.customer_id = cl.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, preference_type, COUNT(preference_id) FROM customers c JOIN consent_preferences cp ON c.customer_id = cp.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name, preference_type;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE consent_given = TRUE;
SELECT customers.customer_name, consent_logs.consent_date FROM customers INNER JOIN consent_logs ON customers.customer_id = consent_logs.customer_id;
SELECT customers.customer_name, consent_preferences.preference_type FROM customers LEFT JOIN consent_preferences ON customers.customer_id = consent_preferences.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_consent_logs FROM customers LEFT JOIN consent_logs ON customers.customer_id = consent_logs.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, MAX(consent_date) AS latest_consent_date FROM customers LEFT JOIN consent_logs ON customers.customer_id = consent_logs.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, AVG(preference_value) AS avg_preference_value FROM customers LEFT JOIN consent_preferences ON customers.customer_id = consent_preferences.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;

SELECT customers.customer_name, consent_logs.consent_action, consent_preferences.preference_type FROM customers INNER JOIN consent_logs ON customers.customer_id = consent_logs.customer_id LEFT JOIN consent_preferences ON customers.customer_id = consent_preferences.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, preference_type FROM customers CROSS JOIN consent_preferences;

SELECT customer_name, consent_logs.consent_date, consent_preferences.preference_value FROM customers LEFT JOIN consent_logs ON customers.customer_id = consent_logs.customer_id LEFT JOIN consent_preferences ON customers.customer_id = consent_preferences.customer_id;
SELECT DISTINCT(customer_name) FROM customers;

SELECT customer_name, AVG(con.et_action) AS avg_consent_action FROM (SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS et_action FROM consent_logs GROUP BY customer_id) AS con INNER JOIN customers ON customers.customer_id = con.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;

SELECT customer_name, MAX(preference_value) - MIN(preference_value) AS preference_value_range FROM customers LEFT JOIN consent_preferences ON customers.customer_id = consent_preferences.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM customers LEFT JOIN consent_logs ON customers.customer_id = consent_logs.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id, customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, AVG(DATEDIFF(now(), consent_date)) AS avg_days_since_consent FROM customers LEFT JOIN consent_logs ON customers.customer_id = consent_logs.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;

SELECT customer_name, SUM(IF(consent_action = 'Given', 1, 0)) AS total_given_consents, SUM(IF(consent_action = 'Withdrawn', 1, 0)) AS total_withdrawn_consents FROM customers LEFT JOIN consent_logs ON customers.customer_id = consent_logs.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;

SELECT customer_name, preference_type, SUM(preference_value) AS total_preference_value FROM customers LEFT JOIN consent_preferences ON customers.customer_id = consent_preferences.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name, preference_type;

SELECT customer_name, AVG(preference_value) AS avg_preference_value, COUNT(preference_type) AS total_preferences FROM customers LEFT JOIN consent_preferences ON customers.customer_id = consent_preferences.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;

SELECT customer_name, COUNT(DISTINCT(preference_type)) AS total_unique_preferences FROM customers LEFT JOIN consent_preferences ON customers.customer_id = consent_preferences.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;

SELECT customer_name, MAX(preference_value) AS max_preference_value, MIN(preference_value) AS min_preference_value FROM customers LEFT JOIN consent_preferences ON customers.customer_id = consent_preferences.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;

SELECT customer_name, preference_type, preference_value FROM customers LEFT JOIN consent_preferences ON customers.customer_id = consent_preferences.customer_id WHERE preference_value LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM customer;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customer;
SELECT id, consent_given FROM customer;
SELECT * FROM consent_type;
SELECT id, type_name FROM consent_type;
SELECT * FROM customer_consent;
SELECT customer_id, consent_type_id, consent_date FROM customer_consent;
SELECT * FROM consent_log;
SELECT log_id, customer_id, action FROM consent_log;
SELECT id, name, email, phone, consent_given FROM customer;
SELECT type_name FROM consent_type;
SELECT customer_id, action FROM consent_log;
SELECT id, name, email, phone, consent_given FROM customer WHERE consent_given = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM consent_log WHERE log_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, name, email, phone FROM customer WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_id, consent_type_id FROM customer_consent WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, consent_type_id FROM customer_consent WHERE consent_type_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customer_consent WHERE consent_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customer_consent ORDER BY consent_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customer;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM consent_log;
SELECT name, email FROM customer;
SELECT name, email, phone FROM customer WHERE id = 1;
SELECT c.name, t.type_name FROM customer c JOIN consent_type t ON c.id = t.id;
SELECT c.name, l.action FROM customer c JOIN consent_log l ON c.id = l.customer_id;
SELECT c.name, t.type_name, l.log_date FROM customer c JOIN consent_type t ON c.id = t.id JOIN consent_log l ON c.id = l.customer_id;
SELECT c.name, l.log_date FROM customer c JOIN consent_log l ON c.id = l.customer_id WHERE l.action = 'consent_given';
SELECT c.name, l.log_date FROM customer c JOIN consent_log l ON c.id = l.customer_id WHERE l.log_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY l.log_date DESC;
SELECT c.name, COUNT(l.log_id) AS log_count FROM customer c JOIN consent_log l ON c.id = l.customer_id GROUP BY c.name;
SELECT c.name, AVG(l.log_date) AS avg_log_date FROM customer c JOIN consent_log l ON c.id = l.customer_id GROUP BY c.name;
SELECT c.name, MAX(l.log_date) AS latest_log_date FROM customer c JOIN consent_log l ON c.id = l.customer_id GROUP BY c.name;
SELECT c.name, MIN(l.log_date) AS earliest_log_date FROM customer c JOIN consent_log l ON c.id = l.customer_id GROUP BY c.name;
SELECT c.name, COUNT(l.log_id) AS log_count FROM customer c JOIN consent_log l ON c.id = l.customer_id WHERE c.consent_given = TRUE GROUP BY c.name;
SELECT c.name, SUM(l.action = 'consent_given') AS consent_given_count FROM customer c JOIN consent_log l ON c.id = l.customer_id GROUP BY c.name;

SELECT c.name, t.type_name, COUNT(c.id) AS consent_count FROM customer c JOIN consent_type t ON c.id = t.id JOIN customer_consent cc ON c.id = cc.customer_id WHERE cc.consent_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY c.name, t.type_name;

SELECT c.name, t.type_name, COUNT(cc.consent_type_id) AS consent_count FROM customer c JOIN consent_type t ON c.id = t.id JOIN customer_consent cc ON c.id = cc.customer_id WHERE cc.consent_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY c.name, t.type_name;

SELECT c.name, t.type_name, AVG(DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, cc.consent_date)) AS avg_days_since_consent FROM customer c JOIN consent_type t ON c.id = t.id JOIN customer_consent cc ON c.id = cc.customer_id GROUP BY c.name, t.type_name;

SELECT c.name, t.type_name, MAX(DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, cc.consent_date)) AS max_days_since_consent FROM customer c JOIN consent_type t ON c.id = t.id JOIN customer_consent cc ON c.id = cc.customer_id GROUP BY c.name, t.type_name;

SELECT c.name, t.type_name, MIN(DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, cc.consent_date)) AS min_days_since_consent FROM customer c JOIN consent_type t ON c.id = t.id JOIN customer_consent cc ON c.id = cc.customer_id GROUP BY c.name, t.type_name;

SELECT c.name, t.type_name, AVG(DATEDIFF(cc.consent_date, l.log_date)) AS avg_days_between_consent_and_log FROM customer c JOIN consent_type t ON c.id = t.id JOIN customer_consent cc ON c.id = cc.customer_id JOIN consent_log l ON c.id = l.customer_id GROUP BY c.name, t.type_name;

SELECT c.name, t.type_name, MAX(DATEDIFF(cc.consent_date, l.log_date)) AS max_days_between_consent_and_log FROM customer c JOIN consent_type t ON c.id = t.id JOIN customer_consent cc ON c.id = cc.customer_id JOIN consent_log l ON c.id = l.customer_id GROUP BY c.name, t.type_name;

SELECT c.name, t.type_name, MIN(DATEDIFF(cc.consent_date, l.log_date)) AS min_days_between_consent_and_log FROM customer c JOIN consent_type t ON c.id = t.id JOIN customer_consent cc ON c.id = cc.customer_id JOIN consent_log l ON c.id = l.customer_id GROUP BY c.name, t.type_name;
SELECT * FROM customer;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, phone_number FROM customer;
SELECT * FROM consent_type;
SELECT consent_type_id, consent_description FROM consent_type;
SELECT customer_id, consent_type_id, consent_date FROM customer_consent;
SELECT audit_id, customer_id, consent_type_id, action_performed, action_timestamp FROM consent_audit;
SELECT log_id, audit_id, log_description, log_timestamp FROM audit_log;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, ct.consent_description FROM customer c JOIN customer_consent cc ON c.customer_id = cc.customer_id JOIN consent_type ct ON cc.consent_type_id = ct.consent_type_id;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, cc.consent_date, ca.action_performed FROM customer c JOIN customer_consent cc ON c.customer_id = cc.customer_id JOIN consent_audit ca ON cc.customer_id = ca.customer_id;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, ca.action_timestamp, al.log_description FROM customer c JOIN consent_audit ca ON c.customer_id = ca.customer_id JOIN audit_log al ON ca.audit_id = al.audit_id;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.first_name, cc.consent_type_id, ct.consent_description FROM customer c JOIN customer_consent cc ON c.customer_id = cc.customer_id JOIN consent_type ct ON cc.consent_type_id = ct.consent_type_id;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.first_name, cc.consent_date, ca.action_timestamp FROM customer c JOIN customer_consent cc ON c.customer_id = cc.customer_id JOIN consent_audit ca ON cc.customer_id = ca.customer_id;

SELECT ct.consent_type_id, ct.consent_description, cc.consent_date, ca.action_timestamp FROM consent_type ct JOIN customer_consent cc ON ct.consent_type_id = cc.consent_type_id JOIN consent_audit ca ON cc.customer_id = ca.customer_id;
SELECT ca.action_performed, ca.action_timestamp, al.log_description, al.log_timestamp FROM consent_audit ca JOIN audit_log al ON ca.audit_id = al.audit_id;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.first_name, c.last_name, cc.consent_type_id, ct.consent_description, cc.consent_date FROM customer c JOIN customer_consent cc ON c.customer_id = cc.customer_id JOIN consent_type ct ON cc.consent_type_id = ct.consent_type_id;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.first_name, c.last_name, cc.consent_type_id, ct.consent_description, ca.action_performed, al.log_description FROM customer c JOIN customer_consent cc ON c.customer_id = cc.customer_id JOIN consent_type ct ON cc.consent_type_id = ct.consent_type_id JOIN consent_audit ca ON cc.customer_id = ca.customer_id JOIN audit_log al ON ca.audit_id = al.audit_id;
SELECT * FROM customer WHERE consent_given = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM customer WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM customer WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT * FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer WHERE consent_given = TRUE;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, ct.consent_description FROM customer c JOIN customer_consent cc ON c.customer_id = cc.customer_id JOIN consent_type ct ON cc.consent_type_id = ct.consent_type_id;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, ca.action_performed, ca.action_timestamp FROM customer c JOIN consent_audit ca ON c.customer_id = ca.customer_id;
SELECT ca.action_performed, ca.action_timestamp, al.log_description FROM consent_audit ca JOIN audit_log al ON ca.audit_id = al.audit_id;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, ca.action_performed, al.log_description FROM customer c JOIN consent_audit ca ON c.customer_id = ca.customer_id JOIN audit_log al ON ca.audit_id = al.audit_id;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, ca.action_performed, al.log_timestamp FROM customer c JOIN consent_audit ca ON c.customer_id = ca.customer_id JOIN audit_log al ON ca.audit_id = al.audit_id WHERE al.log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, ca.action_performed, ca.action_timestamp FROM customer c JOIN consent_audit ca ON c.customer_id = ca.customer_id WHERE ca.action_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT ct.consent_description, COUNT(cc.consent_type_id) AS consent_count FROM consent_type ct JOIN customer_consent cc ON ct.consent_type_id = cc.consent_type_id GROUP BY ct.consent_description;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, CASE WHEN consent_given THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS consent_status FROM customer;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, ct.consent_description, ca.action_performed, al.log_description FROM customer c JOIN consent_audit ca ON c.customer_id = ca.customer_id JOIN audit_log al ON ca.audit_id = al.audit_id JOIN customer_consent cc ON c.customer_id = cc.customer_id JOIN consent_type ct ON cc.consent_type_id = ct.consent_type_id;

SELECT ct.consent_description, AVG(DATEDIFF(ca.action_timestamp, cc.consent_date)) AS avg_days_to_action FROM consent_type ct JOIN customer_consent cc ON ct.consent_type_id = cc.consent_type_id JOIN consent_audit ca ON cc.customer_id = ca.customer_id GROUP BY ct.consent_description;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, ca.action_performed FROM customer c JOIN consent_audit ca ON c.customer_id = ca.customer_id WHERE ca.action_performed LIKE '%updated%';
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, ca.action_timestamp FROM customer c JOIN consent_audit ca ON c.customer_id = ca.customer_id WHERE ca.action_timestamp::date = current_date;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, ca.action_timestamp FROM customer c JOIN consent_audit ca ON c.customer_id = ca.customer_id WHERE extract(month from ca.action_timestamp) = extract(month from current_date);

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, ca.action_timestamp FROM customer c JOIN consent_audit ca ON c.customer_id = ca.customer_id WHERE extract(year from ca.action_timestamp) = extract(year from current_date);

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, ca.action_timestamp FROM customer c JOIN consent_audit ca ON c.customer_id = ca.customer_id WHERE extract(day from ca.action_timestamp) = extract(day from current_date);

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, ca.action_timestamp FROM customer c JOIN consent_audit ca ON c.customer_id = ca.customer_id WHERE extract(hour from ca.action_timestamp) = extract(hour from current_timestamp);

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, ca.action_timestamp FROM customer c JOIN consent_audit ca ON c.customer_id = ca.customer_id WHERE extract(minute from ca.action_timestamp) = extract(minute from current_timestamp);

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, ca.action_timestamp FROM customer c JOIN consent_audit ca ON c.customer_id = ca.customer_id WHERE extract(second from ca.action_timestamp) = extract(second from current_timestamp);
